it.ennova.zerxconf.utils

Class NsdUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ennova.zerxconf.utils.NsdUtils

  • public class NsdUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the one used in order to deal with the different issues with NetworkServiceDiscoveryInfo

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String NSD_URL_PATTERN
      This constant is the one that matches the specification of the ZeroConf protocol

      • from

        public static NsdServiceInfo from(NetworkServiceDiscoveryInfo source)
        This method is the one that will build the NsdServiceInfo from the NetworkServiceDiscoveryInfo
        Parameters:
        source - the source data
        Returns:
        an instance of NsdServiceInfo with all the needed data

      • cleanProtocolOf

        public static java.lang.String cleanProtocolOf(NetworkServiceDiscoveryInfo info)
        This method is needed in order to clean the protocol in case a discovery if requested after invoking the ZeRXconf.startDiscovery(Context) method
        Parameters:
        info - the target NetworkServiceDiscoveryInfo data structure
        Returns:
        the cleaned String ready to be used for a new scanning

      • isValidProtocol

        public static boolean isValidProtocol(java.lang.String protocol)
        This method is the one that will apply the NSD_URL_PATTERN regular expression in order to understand if the given protocol is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the target protocol
        Returns:
        true if the given protocol is valid, false otherwise
